about_the_game: This DLC unlocks the 18+ Adult Content for "Myrcella the Meandering Mage". In this DLC expect to see lesbian sex scenes that include both images of lesbian women having sexual and romantic relations and a tasty tale telling of the action!

content_descriptors.notes: The 18+ patch unlocks the adult content featured in the game. The game features romantic and sexual intercourse between lesbian women.

detailed_description: This DLC unlocks the 18+ Adult Content for "Myrcella the Meandering Mage". In this DLC expect to see lesbian sex scenes that include both images of lesbian women having sexual and romantic relations and a tasty tale telling of the action!
name: Myrcella the Meandering Mage 18+ Patch
